name: Mailigen
tag_list: email-marketing, email-marketing-software, direct-marketing, direct-e-mail-marketing, social-marketing, sms-marketing
overview:
Mailigen is one of the leading Europe’s provider of web-based email marketing software for any size of business, organizations, and individuals.

Mailigen provides intuitive and very easy to use email marketing system to all sizes of businesses. It is the most cost-effective web-based email marketing solution out there and we offer sophisticated features that usually cost hundreds of dollars if not more.

We offer:

Email + social + SMS for increased ROI and relationship marketing. Powerful features - autoresponders, sign-up form builder, list segmentation and online surveys comes with your plan. United SMS and email platform, innovative Drag’n’Drop email template editor, dynamic RSS feature, integration with Wordpress and Joomla, API integration. Custom design templates, strategy development, campaign management, email audit. Top-notch deliverability - we have developed trusted relationships with ISP’s. Priced just right - starter plan is $10 per month. Mailigen ir your most cost-effective one-stop service. Sign up for a free 30 day trial account. Our team is always available via phone, live chat or email 24/7 - for support, advice on best practices or just friendly talk about your email campaign.

http://www.mailigen.com

milestones.description: Mailigen joins the DMA/Email Experience Council’s project, called S.A.M.E. (Support the Adoption of Metrics for Email), and receives an “email measurement accuracy” seal.
Launch of Mailigen v2.0 and new features.
Mailigen joins Commission Junction affiliate network.
Mailigen receives TopTen Reviews silver award for achieving excellent deliverability and functionality.

external_links.title: Mailigen - New Generation of Email Marketing
